column2: "Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones. My fears were completely unfounded, then."
"You'll need Grinders each time you make an upgrade, but it's worth the performance boost you'll get."
"Of course, it could also end in failure. But only an idiot allows fear to rule their decisions."
"Heh. This reminds me of this one time back in the day, when I dropped my Grinder into a..."
